title: SK Kravaře
text:
SK Kravaře is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club located in the town of <a href="Krava%C5%99e">Kravaře</a> in the <a href="Moravian-Silesian%20Region">Moravian-Silesian Region</a>. It currently plays in the fifth tier of Czech football. The club has taken part in the <a href="Czech%20Cup">Czech Cup</a> numerous times, reaching the second round in <a href="1998%E2%80%9399%20Czech%20Cup">1998–99</a>.
The club operated with the lowest budget of all clubs competing in the <a href="Czech%20Fourth%20Division">Czech Fourth Division</a> in the 2012–13 season. They were relegated at the end of the season.
